multiple_choice.question: Who did the man meet when walking?
What did the man feel when he saw the lion?
What did the man do in the end?

fill_in_the_blanks.question: Lion was resting in the short grass
There was a low rumble in the lion's stomach, because he was hungry
They both woke up confused and frightened

meanings.sudden: occurring or done quickly and unexpectedly
meanings.rumble: make a continuous deep, resonant sound
meanings.direction: a course along which someone or something moves
